publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2915 Sarah Boyack: The Conferring of the Freedom of the City of Edinburgh on Aung San Suu Kyiâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the City of Edinburgh Council on its decision to confer the Freedom of the City on Aung San Suu Kyi, Head of the National League for Democracy in Burma, in recognition of her personal courage and relentless pursuit of democratic justice in the country and others like her who have sought to secure democracy and human rights in Burma by non-violent means and welcomes her son to Edinburgh to take part in a commemorative tree planting ceremony in her honour to mark her 60th birthday and highlight the injustice of her on-going house arrest.

S2M-2915 The Conferring of the Freedom of the City of Edinburgh on Aung San Suu Kyi (lodged on 3 June 2005) Linda Fabiani*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mike Pringle*, Patrick Harvie*, Trish Godman*, Bruce Crawford*, Dr Elaine Murray*

S2M-2915 The Conferring of the Freedom of the City of Edinburgh on Aung San Suu Kyi (lodged on 3 June 2005) Robin Harper*, Shiona Baird*, Robert Brown*, Jackie Baillie*, Fiona Hyslop*, Chris Ballance*, Mr John Swinney*, Karen Gillon*, Ms Sandra White*, Stewart Stevenson*, Elaine Smith*, Campbell Martin*, Nora Radcliffe*, Scott Barrie*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Bill Butler*, Alex Neil*, David McLetchie*, Pauline McNeill*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Maureen Macmillan*, Cathy Peattie*, Eleanor Scott*, Des McNulty*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Donald Gorrie*, Roseanna Cunningham*

S2M-2915 The Conferring of the Freedom of the City of Edinburgh on Aung San Suu Kyi (lodged on 3 June 2005) Richard Lochhead*, Margaret Smith*, Michael McMahon*, Cathie Craigie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Dr Jean Turner*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-2915 The Conferring of the Freedom of the City of Edinburgh on Aung San Suu Kyi (lodged on 3 June 2005) Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Mark Ballard*, John Swinburne*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-2915 The Conferring of the Freedom of the City of Edinburgh on Aung San Suu Kyi (lodged on 3 June 2005) Frances Curran*, Marlyn Glen*
